title: Will Aamir’s next film be a modern take on Lagaan?
text: Deccan Chronicle | Natasha Coutinho | October 23, 2015, 23.05 pm Aamir Khan Buzz in B-town is that Aamir Khan, who is currently busy shooting for Dangal where he plays the wrestler Mahavir Singh Phogat, is also contemplating another film once he gets done with his current project. A source in the know reveals, “The film is said to be based on the current tax system, which might remind one of Lagaan that was also based on a similar theme. Aamir loved the idea when he heard it and is keen to explore it once he is done with his current commitments. A new face is likely to be approached to play the female protagonist in the film — much like Lagaan again.” We contacted Aamir’s spokesperson to confirm the news, but there was no revert till the time of going to the press.
